title: Stunning Beach Front Land For Sale in Trincomalee
details:
We Are proud to offer 30 Acres of pristine land and stunning beach front for sale in Trincomalee .
This Prime Lans Situated in saambal Thivu , From Trincomalee 9km towards Nilaveli .
This property has both Trincomalee town view and Pigeon Island View . This Land is Suitable for Hotels and beach Front Tourism Activities

Distances From
Nilaveli Beach 12km
trincomalee town 9 Km
Airport 17km
Railway station 9.5km
